name: tm44
effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The user sleeps for 2 turns to restore health and status.
flavor_text.emerald: The user sleeps for 2 turns to restore health and status.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user sleeps for two turns to fully restore HP and heal any status problem.
